          <title>
            <string language="hu-HU">A sejtek lebontó folyamatai</string>
            <string language="en-US">The Catabolic Processes Of Cells</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Zersetzungsprozesse Der Zellen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Processus Cataboliques des Cellules</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os Processos Catabolic Das Pilhas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I Processi Catabolici Delle Cellule</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι καταβολικές διαδικασίες των κυττάρων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los Procesos Catabólicos De Células</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu-HU</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu-HU">A szerves anyagok (szénhidrátok, zsírok, fehérjék) lebontási folyamatainak áttekintő vázlata; a biológiai oxidáció és az erjedés</string>
            <string language="en-US">Draft Overview for the Catabolic Processes of Organic Materials (Carbo-hydrates, Fats, Proteins); Biological Oxidation and Fermentation</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">biológia</string>
            <string language="en-US">biology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">biokémia</string>
            <string language="en-US">biochemistry</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">lebontó folyamat</string>
            <string language="en-US">catabolic process</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">biológiai oxidáció</string>
            <string language="en-US">biological oxidation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">erjedés</string>
            <string language="en-US">fermentation</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Entwurf-Überblick für die Zersetzungsprozesse 
der organischen Materialien (Kohlenhydrate, Fette, Proteine); 
Biologische Oxidation und Gärung</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Vue d'ensemble d'ébauche pour les processus 
cataboliques des matériaux organiques (hydrates de carbone, graisses,
protéines) ; Oxydation et fermentation biologiques</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Vista geral do esboço para os processos catabolic
de materiais orgânicos (hidratos de carbono, gorduras, proteínas); 
Oxidação e fermentation biológicos</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Descrizione della brutta copia per i processi 
catabolici dei materiali organici (carboidrati, grassi, proteine); 
Ossidazione e fermentazione biologiche</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επισκόπηση σχεδίων για τις καταβολικές διαδικασίες των
οργανικών υλικών (υδατάνθρακες, λίπη, πρωτεϊ'νες)  
Βιολογικές οξείδωση και ζύμωση</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Descripción del bosquejo para los procesos 
catabólicos de los materiales orgánicos (carbohidratos, grasas, 
proteínas); Oxidación y fermentación biológicas</string>
          </description>
